name: urMusik

screenshots.caption: urMusik taskbar integration, new on Beta 2

short_description:
urMusik is a free, open-source audio player aimed to provide an easy to use interface with all the core functionality: music playback in all common formats, playlists, audio libraries, artist, album and song view, shuffle function and a handy search box to quickly find your music.

Aditionally, urMusik is available in Spanish, Catalan and English, and you can easily switch between them from the user interface.

urMusik provides an extension feature that allows users to add more functionality to the player. Two extensions are already bundled to provide the best experience: an equalizer extension with sound effects and a visualization extension to enjoy your music in fullscreen.
summary: An easy to use, free audio player
